sources.title: Jack the Giant Killer (FANTASY ABENTEUER ganzer Film Deutsch, Abenteuerfilme, Action Filme komplett)
Jack The Giant Killer | Full Movie | Action Adventure Fantasy
sources.description:
Jack The Giant Killer - A giant beanstalk brings Jack to a land in the clouds filled with snarling, evil beasts. When the creatures make their way to the ground, Jack must figure out how to get back down before they destroy earth and everyone in it.
2013. Stars: Jamie Atkins, Robert Boyle, Jane March

sources.title: Jack The Giant Killer (1962) Adventure Fantasy | directed by Nathan Juran
sources.description:
In a fairy tale kingdom, the evil sorcerer Pendragon returns from exile to kidnap Princess Elaine, seeking revenge against the crown. A brave farmer named Jack, aided by a magical leprechaun and his friends, embarks on a perilous journey to rescue Elaine and defeat Pendragon’s dark forces. With the help of wishes, Jack slays a giant, frees Elaine from a curse, and destroys Pendragon, restoring peace to the kingdom.

Original title: Jack The Giant Killer (1962) 

Director: Nathan Juran
Writers: Orville H. Hampton, Nathan Juran

Main Actors:
Kerwin Mathews - Jack
Judi Meredith - Princess Elaine
Torin Thatcher - Pendragon
Walter Burke - Garna
Don Beddoe - the Imp
Barry Kelley - Sigurd
Dayton Lummis - King Mark
Anna Lee - Lady Constance
Roger Mobley - Peter
Robert Gist - Scottish Captain
Tudor Owen - Chancellor


00:00 Full movie (with French, German, Italian & Portuguese dubbed audio)
05:21 The kingdom of Cornwall is threatened by Pendragon, the Black Prince who commands giants.
12:45 Princess Elaine is kidnapped by a giant, prompting Jack to embark on a daring rescue mission.
20:10 Jack confronts the giant in a fierce battle, ultimately defeating him and saving the princess.
35:30 King Mark rewards Jack for his bravery, declaring him a hero of the kingdom.
50:15 Pendragon plots revenge, using dark magic to summon more giants against Jack and the kingdom.
1:05:40 Jack infiltrates Pendragon's lair, facing enchanted creatures and overcoming magical obstacles.
1:25:00 In a climactic showdown, Jack defeats Pendragon, restoring peace and safety to the kingdom.


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: The terrible and trecherous Pendragon plans to gain the throne of Cornwall by getting the king to abdicate and to marry his lovely daughter. To help him he has his dreadful witches in his castle and his almost unstoppable sorcery. A giant under his control abducts the princess, but on the way home with her the giant meets farming lad Jack who slays him. This is only the beginning. Be assured Pendragon and his evil magic are far from done.
metadata.Actors: Kerwin Mathews, Judi Meredith, Torin Thatcher
